trans-unit.resname: SPG·1 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Name
SPG·1 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
trans-unit.target: 其他人鱼得+1/+1且具有海岛行者异能。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Name
SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个海盗向对手造成伤害时，每有一位受到伤害的对手，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Text | Paragraph 3
SPG·3 | Bridge from Below | Card Name
SPG·3 | Bridge from Below | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物从战场进入你的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·3 | Bridge from Below | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当一个生物从战场进入对手的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，则放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·4 | Mephidross Vampire | Card Name
SPG·4 | Mephidross Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·4 | Mephidross Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的生物均额外具有吸血鬼此生物类别，且具有「每当此生物对任一生物造成伤害时，在前者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」

trans-unit.resname: SPG·5 | Pitiless Plunderer | Card Name
SPG·5 | Pitiless Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 莽霸联盟袭劫者布里奇

trans-unit.resname: SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个海盗向对手造成伤害时，放逐每位受到伤害之对手的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用这些牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放这些咒语。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Name
SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你可以牺牲任意数量的神器和／或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。对此咒语而言，你每以此法牺牲一个永久物，它便减少{2}来施放，且你本回合中每牺牲过一个其他神器或生物，它便再减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
SPG·8 | Rampaging Ferocidon | Card Name
SPG·8 | Rampaging Ferocidon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·8 | Rampaging Ferocidon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·8 | Rampaging Ferocidon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物进战场时，CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·9 | Underworld Breach | Card Name
SPG·9 | Underworld Breach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的每张非地牌均具有逸脱异能。其逸脱费用等同于该牌的法术力费用加上从你的坟墓场放逐三张其他牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·9 | Underworld Breach | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在结束步骤开始时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·10 | Carnage Tyrant | Card Name
SPG·10 | Carnage Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·10 | Carnage Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·11 | Ghalta, Primal Hunger | Card Name
SPG·11 | Ghalta, Primal Hunger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为由你操控之生物的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·11 | Ghalta, Primal Hunger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·12 | Polyraptor | Card Name
SPG·12 | Polyraptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为CARDNAME的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·13 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Name
SPG·13 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if CARDNAME is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间咒语时，若CARDNAME已横置，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·13 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.
trans-unit.target: 每当你复制瞬间咒语时，在卡勒麦上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Name
SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.
trans-unit.target: +2：弃一张牌，然后抓一张牌。如果以此法弃掉一张地牌，则额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: −3：将至多两张目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.
trans-unit.target: −11：消灭至多六个目标非地永久物，然后派出六个2/2绿色，具树林行者异能的猫／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraph 4
SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Name
SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，本次战斗中每位对手均不能以多于一个生物进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME已横置，每次战斗攻击你的生物便不能多于一个。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Card Name
SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {4}：占卜1，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它是地牌，则将之横置放进战场。若否，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·17 | Mana Crypt | Card Name
SPG·17 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，掷一枚硬币。若你输掉此掷，则CARDNAME对你造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·17 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·18 | Star Compass | Card Name
SPG·18 | Star Compass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·18 | Star Compass | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控的基本地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·19 | Ghostly Prison | Card Name
SPG·19 | Ghostly Prison | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·20 | Fabricate | Card Name
SPG·20 | Fabricate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·21 | Show and Tell | Card Name
SPG·21 | Show and Tell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手均可以将一张神器，生物，结界或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·22 | Tragic Slip | Card Name
SPG·22 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·22 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·23 | Victimize | Card Name
SPG·23 | Victimize | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选之牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·24 | Gamble | Card Name
SPG·24 | Gamble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，随机弃一张牌，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·25 | Crashing Footfalls | Card Name
SPG·25 | Crashing Footfalls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Suspend 4—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 延缓4～{G}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你能支付{G}并将它放逐，且上面有四个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，你可以施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: SPG·25 | Crashing Footfalls | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Create two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个4/4绿色，具践踏异能的犀牛衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·26 | Tireless Tracker | Card Name
SPG·26 | Tireless Tracker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: SPG·26 | Tireless Tracker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个线索时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Name
SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: •反击目标咒语，且其法术力值须等于或小于其操控者坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标生物，且其法术力值须等于或小于其操控者坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Name
SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若你操控七个或更多名称各不相同的地，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。
